website_summaries.verdict: Trendy, comfortable and durable enough to wear every day, their main flaw is slick soles.
pros: Spiky rubber toe box does not crease easily
cons: Shoes can slip on smooth flooring or wet surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Wow 100% legit.  & only 4 days to arrive!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I was hesitant at first bc shoes are coming from Taiwan , but so glad I ordered from this place. Not only was the shoe perfect but it took like 4 days from the day I ordered it to it getting delivered to me in San Francisco!!!! 100% legit and authentic came with original box and tissue and shoe horns with not even a dent in the box! I am very pleased and impressed. Real talk.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the size!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't fit them, being a Male with a 9 inch foot, and the shoe made for 6inch youth! But my lady friend enjoys them just fine! I love the design.. after hours of searching for unique creations I dont see everyday. I misread the advert, thinking I would be able to wear these. I was excited to finally receive these in the mail since Amazon prime shipping wasn't available! Only to find they dont fit. No buggy, just made like they were a gift for my lady. They look good on her feet. But won't go for every outfit or style woman have!
customer_reviews.author: bloc Bostx

customer_reviews.title: love these boots
customer_reviews.text: love these boots. if i could imagine walking on the moon this would be it,i plow right through the snow with these with little effort. water resistance is excellent so far, very little snow gets into the cuff/ankle, I also took a walk through some muddy trails with no problems later, just rinsed off with a garden hose and looked like new, not much dirt sticks to the material. I would have given these five stars except for the fact that these shoes get slippery on certain smooth surfaces, like tile, or a wet tree stump, so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Awsome just flat out awsome
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They fit as expected and they are rain resistance like timberlands but light and stylish like airforce once. These shoes are perfect all year around but especially during the winter. These are now my third pair and I get complainants everywhere I go if you have been thinking about picking these up just do it you won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: Crazy M

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost I must inform y'all that this review is by a person with wide feet. Ok, this is the first time ever that I buy shoes at this price I buy shoes always under $30. I'm size ten in cheap shoes and my concern was that my feet where going to be too wide for these boots. But thank goodness size 10 feet perfectly! Not too tight not to loose. These boots are a dream to walk on, they are extremely comfortable. Also dont be afraid to wear them on warm days, I've been wearing them in the southern California summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kingz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trail boot
customer_reviews.text: What a great boot! Perfect fit, comfortable, light, yet feels sturdy. I bought it for walking on the green trail behind my house. Was a great in the snow and even worked for my snow bicycling. Black on black hid the silly Nike "Swoosh" exactly what I wanted. The styling is aggressive and unusual. I was so pleased, I wanted to buy another pair ASAP. But by the time i decided to do that, the price was 40% higher. Guess 'ill wait out the next deal. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... are they very stylish but they are rugged and comfortable once you brake them in and oh their waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I do very vigorous work for a living a lot of walking around 18 miles a day 5 days a week and i stand behind this boot not only are they very stylish but they are rugged and comfortable once you brake them in and oh their waterproof. Great job Nike love the Air Force 1 style fire......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price imo
customer_reviews.text: Got them fast and am already a proud owner of the black duckboots so i know what to expect. With that said these boots are very comfortable and stylish. I have gotten many compliments taking the train into Manhattan. I love them. The rubber front (with the small raised spikes) is great because they dont lend themselves to creases which many boots have issues with. Two months with my black ones and no noticeable creases in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: AF1 RAINBOOTS *not meant for wet weather*
customer_reviews.text: transaction, shipping, etc was great. no complaints there but the product itself is a major let down. i got two pairs specifically for days when its raining (i bike around city all day for work) and a few times i literally slipped on my ass just walking on the wet sidewalk. no ice, just water from the rain. I figured it was just me being clumsy but it happened again with other pair, im now writing the review bc its happened several times in both pairs...so yea awesome looking shoes just not meant for the rain...$200 wasted :(
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Slutsky

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have three different colors but oddly each is too large. The green pair fits best true to size. This pair and the military looking one with rear zipper I had to give away. Too large... not true to size. I'm not a NIKE fan but love the retro shoes. I wear the high top to support a prosthetic ankle implant. Unisex buy...
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Loved these boots
customer_reviews.text: Loved these boots. I don't use them everyday however I use them every time I go hiking. They have held up great. Its a lot of wear and tear on the shoes with the rocks I climb so I imagine if any tears or ungluing might happen I will notice soon. If that happens, I will update this review. Although I am thinking of getting another pair for causal use. They feel great.
customer_reviews.author: jays4life

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable duck boot with style!
customer_reviews.text: nothing but non stop compliments. Wore these to the snow and I continue to wear these on rainy days. I used to own a pair of Air Force Ones (mid) and these feel nothing like them. They are lighter and have a softer sole than the AF1. The only CON is that they are a bit slippy on smooth wet surfaces so beware on wet stairs and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I looked up wide width shoes on amazon These were listed I ordered them + tried them Too narrow = I had to send them back😖
customer_reviews.author: A.J.Moore

customer_reviews.title: Warmth, Protection & Functionality
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your expedient and outstanding service! I received my items quicker than I expected. I am pleased with what I ordered. Worth ordering again when that time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Edward F. T. Charfauros

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Feels Great
customer_reviews.text: It's not only comfortable, but it looks great. It is water resistant as it say as I tested it in the recent bout of rain we've been having here and my feet stay nice and dry even when splashing around in the puddles. Just be careful not to go into water too deep. The tongue isn't connected at the sides and water could get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: CoolSimBro

customer_reviews.title: Durability, Warmth, Protection & Functionality
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your expedient and outstanding service! I received my items quicker than I expected. I am pleased with what I ordered. Worth ordering again when that time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Edward F. T. Charfauros

customer_reviews.title: Great for rainy or wet walks.
customer_reviews.text: My 14yo son loves these. They’re excellent quality and waterproof. We live in the Denver metro area of Colorado and he walks home from school everyday, he always wears these if it’s wet or snowy outside and they keep his feet dry. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patty M

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered these in the past to use for work. 2 years later, we just ordered another pair to replace his old ones. He boasts about how comfortable and durable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Im so happy I ordered another pair in a different color
customer_reviews.text: After researching waterproof boots to play Disc Golf in over winter in NZ , finding Duck boots & narrowing them down , fortunately these Nike duck caught my eye while viewing sneaker boot's . I'v worn all day today done 36 holes , minimal breaking in required & I'm sure to appreciate how light these are compared to a traditional Duck boot . Very happy with
customer_reviews.author: Nath M

customer_reviews.title: They are Nikes
customer_reviews.text: Yes they are real Nikes and they fit as you expect them to if you bought them in a store by the size chart. The price was a little less than in shops here in Hawaii, so bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: They look fake. Stitching is weird.. they ...
customer_reviews.text: They look fake. Stitching is weird.. they were dusty and had some knicks in them so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: i like these shoes, am a little aggravated that one eyelet fell off, glued it back on before i even wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and warm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on recommendation from a friend of mine. They fit perfectly and are very warm in cold weather. I have received many compliments on them as they are very stylish. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT

customer_reviews.title: They lack quality but, they can improve!
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable, but the problem with these shoes is glue! They should improve the quality in which the glue is used and the box arrived very damaged that made me think that if these shoes are used!
customer_reviews.author: Enmanuel Santana Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pair of sneakers! Feels like I'm walking on clouds!
customer_reviews.text: Comfort is unmatched! I love these shoes and I have more in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Malachai Best

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered! :-)
customer_reviews.text: As this is my fourth pair, they are exactly what I was hoping for, brand new in their original box! However, I wear them for work and my employer needs an actual receipt to apply the expense to my boot allowance, there was no receipt in any part of the packaging. That is the only thing I would change about my shopping experience.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these boots!! Not only are they comfortable but also durable! Work outside and these are worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah L Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Athletic Boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Perfect for winter and heading to the gym in the snow. Before I had to wear boots and carry gym shoes to the gym. Best of both here.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Paci Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Everywhere I go people compliment me on these shoes. I purchased both the white and the black from clearoutdeals and they were amazing with their customer service. For these shoes, they upgraded my shipping to priority as a courtesy most likely due to my previous purchase with them. The shoes look great, they fit great, they look wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Nike snowboots are the real deal
customer_reviews.text: All the hype is real. Super comfortable footbed and keeps your feet dry in the most extreme conditions. I would highly recommend these to anyone that wants the protection of snow boots but the style of sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: COLIN J. SALISBURY

customer_reviews.title: Grate traction and looks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the snow. When your walking around town. Grate traction on snow covered side walks, keep your feet warm Being water proof. Was asked were I bought them quite often.
customer_reviews.author: simon tarr

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement by seller
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe. I already own other Nike Duckboots my issue was the product vs the advertisement. It was advertised that the black 2017 duck pot with rubber sole in 8.5 was on sale. What I got was the all green with black swish model in a size 9.
customer_reviews.author: Octavio Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Lightest shoe Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the lightest shoes I have ever come across in size 13 . If you are a size 13 order size 12 .. watch the top loop strap that you hook your lace through the top ankle support part it broke day two .. you just can't be hard on it ..!! Let me tell you it made it strong through snowy wet conditions and the weight you will be amazed !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lousy return policy spoils taste
customer_reviews.text: Decent shoe. Fits large. I wanted to return it but the return label is a “commercial invoice” and I would need to pay 45 bucks to return. Hideous service. But directly from Nike.
customer_reviews.author: Nearly Normal

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and cute
customer_reviews.text: Great for my active son. Great for travel to winter snowy cities
customer_reviews.author: T. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Great price and great product. Look awesome on.
customer_reviews.author: Life Without Louboutins

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a damaged Nike box with tape on and the sneakers had no tags! Obviously these are used. $75 for used sneakers?! My son is so upset!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Marie Fanzo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift end he says they're comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.author: pcampbell

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Shoes themselves are great other then they run a .5 size too small I find and they came with a small rip in them
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Walker

customer_reviews.title: I get a lot of complements on the caps, I LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: Good feel and fit, I hope you like them as much as I do, too fly.
customer_reviews.author: Maxx

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: I use these as work boots. They are the only boot I have tried that do not hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Stark

customer_reviews.title: Super dope. Just went through a long long
customer_reviews.text: Super dope. Just went through a long long, very long Chicago winter wearing them everyday. They look brand new 5 months later. Must own. Can't wait to buy more pairs
customer_reviews.author: Jason Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Light shoe. Shoelaces too long IMO, but that's easy to fix. Only downside is some of the glueing was sloppy along the sole and some stray threads. Besides that, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Nice styling but I had to return because they run kind of small. Def go up half a size for these.
customer_reviews.author: Helmholtz_Watson

customer_reviews.title: Will be purchasing more like it.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way it looks on my feet the comfort of the soles are soooo comfy like my feet is walkin on clouds

customer_reviews.title: Hot shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and the price was good too. Love it and get a few compliments

customer_reviews.title: He was very happy with the style and the fit of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: These were a Valentine's gift for my hubby. He was very happy with the style and the fit of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Monnie

customer_reviews.title: The seller sent us a used, mismatched pair.
customer_reviews.text: One of the shoes in the pair is brand new. The other is clearly worn. It is discolored, had a sauce stain dried on to the top, and is dirty on the bottom. We paid full price for the shoes and expected a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gaudino-Goering

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great winter shoe to hot for summer but if it's cold or snow on the ground greatest and most comfortable shoes ever I have 3 pairs

customer_reviews.title: Great new rain shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these for the rain. They look great too.

customer_reviews.title: Tight on the foot, has that new shoe smell ...
customer_reviews.text: Tight on the foot, has that new shoe smell. The shoe prevents my relaxed fit jean pant leg from dragging on the ground. Two thumbs up!

customer_reviews.title: Great for rainy season
customer_reviews.text: The toe was a little tight but otherwise my partner is really pleased with them. They have performed better than expected and are his fast favorite!

customer_reviews.text: They were the shoes i have been looking for and the fit great, even tho i boutghy them a size bigger just to have the shoe.

customer_reviews.text: These are definitely waterproof but not slip resistant. I can't where them for work because I slide all over the place when I turn on the hose.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and stylish boots. They fit well, they’re durable, look really good and most importantly get the job done.

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots, wrong size!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and comfortable boots but for bad luck I chose the wrong size. I did the purchase again with the correct size and returned the other pair without any problem

customer_reviews.title: Not only the look of the tennis shoes, but the the feel, and quality of the product seems durable.

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel and comfort of these
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are everything I expected. Love the feel and comfort of these. Best Nikes I've owned. Great price also. Will be getting the brown and burgundy pairs next.

product_meta.title: Nike Mens Lunar Force 1 Duckboot Watershield High-Top Fashion Sneakers
product_meta.description: Nike updates the classic Nike Air Force 1 with new technology resulting in a much lighter, more cushioned version. Completely redesigned, the Nike Lunar Force 1 Mid features a lightweight Lunarlon sole with beveled ribs, encapsulated Air-Sole units in the heel/forefoot, adjustable ankle strap, and a rubber outsole with cutouts to reduce weight
